data.title: Grace C. Hotz, Associate
data.meta_description: An associate in the Restructuring Department, Grace’s practice focuses on creditor groups, individual creditors, debtors and distressed investment funds in chapter 11 cases, out-of-court restructurings, bankruptcy-related acquisitions and cross-border matters.
